Body:
sj = StringJoiner()
sj.add('e1').add('e2')
self.assertEqual('e1,e2', str(sj))
print('Sample Default String Joiner Output:', sj)
expected__repr__ = (
    '{"separator": ",", "prefix": "", "suffix": "", "nelem": 2, "str_length": 5, "elements": ["e1", "e2"]}'
    )
self.assertEqual(expected__repr__, sj.__repr__())
